text: Then I saw in the right hand of the one who was seated on the throne a scroll written on the front and back and sealed with seven seals.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> I <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> a <st data-num="2478" class="">powerful</st> <st data-num="32" class="">angel</st> <st data-num="2784" class="">proclaiming</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> a <st data-num="3173" class="">loud</st> <st data-num="5456" class="">voice:</st> “<st data-num="5101">Who</st> is <st data-num="514" class="">worthy</st> to <st data-num="455" class="">open</st> the <st data-num="975" class="">scroll</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="3089" class="">break</st> <st data-num="846" class="">its</st> <st data-num="4973" class="">seals</st>?”

<st data-num="2532" class="">But</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3762">no one</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> <st data-num="3761" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st> <st data-num="3761" class="">or</st> <st data-num="5270" class="">under</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st> was <st data-num="1410" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="455" class="">open</st> the <st data-num="975" class="">scroll</st> <st data-num="3777" class="">or</st> <st data-num="991">look into</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> I began <st data-num="2799" class="">weeping</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">bitterly</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="3762">no one</st> was <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> who was <st data-num="514" class="">worthy</st> to <st data-num="455" class="">open</st> the <st data-num="975" class="">scroll</st> <st data-num="3777" class="">or</st> to <st data-num="991" class="">look into</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>.
Then one of the elders said to me, “Stop weeping! Look, the Lion of the tribe of Judah, the root of David, has conquered; thus he can open the scroll and its seven seals.”

Then I saw standing in the middle of the throne and of the four living creatures, and in the middle of the elders, a Lamb that appeared to have been killed. He had seven horns and seven eyes, which are the seven spirits of God sent out into all the earth.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2983" class="">took</st> the scroll<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="1188">right hand</st> of the one who was <st data-num="2521" class="">seated</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="2362" class="">throne</st>,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3753" class="">when</st> he had <st data-num="2983" class="">taken</st> the <st data-num="975" class="">scroll</st>, the <st data-num="5064" class="">four</st> <st data-num="2226">living creatures</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="1501">twenty</st>-<st data-num="5064" class="">four</st> <st data-num="4245" class="">elders</st> <st data-num="4098" class="">threw</st> themselves <st data-num="4098" class="">to the ground</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1799" class="">before</st> the <st data-num="721" class="">Lamb</st>. <st data-num="1538" class="">Each</st><n id="2" /> of them <st data-num="2192" class="">had</st> a <st data-num="2788" class="">harp</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5552" class="">golden</st> <st data-num="5357" class="">bowls</st> <st data-num="1073" class="">full</st> of <st data-num="2368" class="">incense</st> (<st data-num="3739" class="">which</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> the <st data-num="4335" class="">prayers</st> of the <st data-num="40">saints</st>).<n id="3" />

They were singing a new song:

“You are worthy to take the scroll

and to open its seals

because you were killed,

and at the cost of your own blood you have purchased for God

persons from every tribe, language, people, and nation.
You have appointed them as a kingdom and priests to serve our God, and they will reign on the earth.”

Then I looked and heard the voice of many angels in a circle around the throne, as well as the living creatures and the elders. Their number was ten thousand times ten thousand—thousands times thousands—

all of whom were singing in a loud voice:

“Worthy is the lamb who was killed

to receive power and wealth

and wisdom and might

and honor and glory and praise!”

Then I heard every creature—in heaven, on earth, under the earth, in the sea, and all that is in them—singing:

“To the one seated on the throne and to the Lamb

be praise, honor, glory, and ruling power forever and ever!”
And the four living creatures were saying “Amen,” and the elders threw themselves to the ground and worshiped.
